name: Scrap Road
description:
Scrap road is a multiplayer racing game where you have to dodge boxes and be in first place when the time runs out! Grab up to 3 buddies and compete to see who is the Master of Scrap Road.

Controlls by Player:

  1. Move with the left and right arrow keys, brake with the down arrow key.
  2. Move with the A and D, brake with S.
  3. Move with the V and N, brake with B.
  4. Move with the I and P, brake with O.

This is my submission for the Mix and Game Jam! The theme was to combine two game genres and I chose Racing + Bullet Hell.

The lore I was thinking for this game is that there are many trucks that are dropping these boxes in front of the road, but I didn't implemented it so its not cannon. As far as I'm aware there might be a portal to the box dimension at the end of Scrap Road. Guess we'll never know.

All art, and music was made by me. The sound effects are from:

  • JDWasabi's 8-bit / 16-bit Sound Effects (x25) Pack
  • ObsydianX's Interface SFX Pack 1
